content: I have a good supervisor that support me do the work

TM ELIT Trainee is an apprenticeship program for 8 months. I am assigned in HR People & Culture unit and I am responsible in creating Career Portal for TM RND using Wordpress and updating codings using HTML, PHP, Javascript, Bootstrap codes and a few plugins available. I am involving in Research & Development of the team. I am also responsible in doing research about ClickUp application to ensure that all of the team has a clear view of its usage before going into deeper understanding of the ClickUp.
Great at communication skills and customers services.
